name: Powershell Defender Disable Scan Feature
description: Detects requests to disable Microsoft Defender features using PowerShell commands
false_positives: Other Cmdlets that may use the same parameters
query: ((process.command_line:(/.*[Aa][Dd][Dd]\-[Mm][Pp][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ff][Ee][Rr][Ee][Nn][Cc][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Tt]\-[Mm][Pp][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ff][Ee][Rr][Ee][Nn][Cc][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ .*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Oo][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ee][Hh][Aa][Vv][Ii][Oo][Rr][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ .*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Aa][Tt][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ss][Tt][Ss][Ee][Ee][Nn]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*$[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*\ 1\ .*/)) OR (process.command_line:(/.*[Rr][Gg][Ll][Zz][Yy][Ww][Jj][Ss][Zz][Vv][Jj][Ll][Yy][Ww][Xx]0[Aa][Ww]1[Ll][Tt][Ww]9[Uu][Aa][Xx][Rr][Vv][Cc][Mm][Ll][Uu][Zz][Yy].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Pp][Cc]2[Ff][Ii][Bb][Gg][Vv][Ss][Zz][Ww][Ff][Ss][Dd][Gg][Ll][Tt][Zz][Uu]1[Vv][Bb][Mm][Ll]0[Bb]3[Jj][Pp][Bb][Mm][Cc][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Ee][Aa][Xx][Nn][Hh][Yy][Mm][Xx][Ll][Uu][Mm][Vv][Hh][Bb][Hh][Rr][Pp][Bb][Ww][Vv][Nn][Bb]25[Pp][Dd][Gg]9[Yy][Aa][Ww]5[Nn][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Gg][Ll][Zz][Yy][Ww][Jj][Ss][Zz][Uu][Ll][Pp][Qq][Vv][Zz][Qq][Cc][Mm]90[Zz][Ww][Nn]0[Aa][Ww]9[Uu][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Pp][Cc]2[Ff][Ii][Bb][Gg][Vv][Jj][Tt]0[Ff][Ww][Uu][Hh][Jj][Vv][Dd][Gg][Vv][Jj][Dd][Gg][Ll][Vv][Bb][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Ee][Aa][Xx][Nn][Hh][Yy][Mm][Xx][Ll][Ss][Uu]9[Bb][Vv][Ll][Bb][Yy][Bb]3[Rr][Ll][Yy]3[Rr][Pp][Bb]24[Gg].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Gg][Ll][Zz][Yy][Ww][Jj][Ss][Zz][Uu][Jj][Ll][Aa][Gg][Ff]2[Aa][Ww]9[Yy][Tt][Ww]9[Uu][Aa][Xx][Rr][Vv][Cc][Mm][Ll][Uu][Zz][Yy].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Pp][Cc]2[Ff][Ii][Bb][Gg][Vv][Cc][Zz][Ww][Hh][Hh][Dd][Mm][Ll][Vv][Cc][Kk]1[Vv][Bb][Mm][Ll]0[Bb]3[Jj][Pp][Bb][Mm][Cc][Gg].*/ OR Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:(*Add\-MpPreference\ * OR *Set\-MpPreference\ *) AND process.command_line:(*DisableRealtimeMonitoring\ * OR *DisableIOAVProtection\ *
